thread.title: EagleRider Connects Koreans Worldwide With Their Most Exotic Dreams
thread.title_full: EagleRider Connects Koreans Worldwide With Their Most Exotic Dreams

title: EagleRider Connects Koreans Worldwide With Their Most Exotic Dreams
text: EagleRider Connects Koreans Worldwide With Their Most Exotic Dreams By PR Newswire | 07/03/15 - 12:01 PM EDT Reprint LOS ANGELES , July 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- EagleRider, the world's pioneer and innovator of motorcycle experiences, is working as diligently as ever to unite all peoples on Planet Earth with their wildest dreams. The Chinese and Japanese speaking world have already experienced and weighed-in on the magic of EagleRider tours and services and now—continuing its expansion across Asia—EagleRider has just released a fully localized version of its Website in Korean , heralding the birth of an entire new segment of the company prepared to serve Koreans all across the globe. Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150703/227983LOGO EagleRider's Chief Technology & Product Officer Hal Oreif declares, "The World is counting on us as the artisans of service in our industry to make ourselves available and accessible. The Korean people have stretched their hands out to us, and the release of our Korean website is our way of letting them know that we've heard the message and have officially arrived to do what we do best—make dreams come true."With this latest release, Koreans can also complete transactions with the Won currency as well as receive support in their native language. Check out the Korean website here! ABOUT EAGLERIDER Pioneering the motorcycle rental concept in 1992, EagleRider has since extended its branches to become a motorcycle experience industry giant offering services of all kinds to assist and empower motorcyclists and travelers worldwide. Whether you simply would like to try out the motorcycle of your dreams or go on a great adventure in the self-drive and guided tours offered from any one of our beautifully located 100+ locations across the globe, EagleRider offers the world's favorite brands including Harley-Davidson®, Indian®, Honda® and BMW® in motorcycles as well as Scooters, Dirt Bikes, and ATV's. We also provide motorcycle service, parts, and accessories in addition to a vast array of solutions for individuals as well as dealers that are looking to buy and/or sell their bikes. For more information on rentals and tours, please visit www.EagleRider.com . If you are interested in buying and/or selling a bike, visit www.UsedMotorcycles.net. Our inventory of parts and accessories can be found at Store.EagleRider.com .
